hook: The world's winners? They failed the MOST.
hook_visual_note: Quick montage of 'FAILURE' text, then a question mark, then a silhouette of a person standing tall.
buildup: J.K. Rowling's first Harry Potter book was rejected 12 times. Michael Jordan? Cut from his high school team, missed thousands of shots. He famously said, 'I've failed over and over... that's why I succeed.' They understood failure isn't the end.
buildup_visual_note: Visuals of J.K. Rowling's book, then rejection letters. Michael Jordan playing basketball.
punchline: Your failures don't define you. They teach you. They're not dead ends; they're directions. You become good at things through hard work, not by avoiding mistakes. Embrace the lesson.
punchline_visual_note: Animation of a path with 'FAILURE' signs turning into 'LESSON' signs. Person walking confidently.
full_rewritten: The world's winners? They failed the MOST. J.K. Rowling's first Harry Potter book was rejected 12 times. Michael Jordan? Cut from his high school team, missed thousands of shots. He famously said, 'I've failed over and over... that's why I succeed.' They understood failure isn't the end. Your failures don't define you. They teach you. They're not dead ends; they're directions. You become good at things through hard work, not by avoiding mistakes. Embrace the lesson.
